name: Envy
description: ENVY Imperial Pilsner obsessively desires to be better than the worldâ€™s most common lager. Envy vies for attention with its beautifully bright, golden color and tightly-formed crown. Intense yet true pilsner malt provides the perfect base for profuse citrus, floral and spicy hop flavor. Envy achieves distinction, making other beers turn green.
